statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT interaction_time, engagement_level FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, engagement_level FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE engagement_level BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY engagement_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_time > '2022-01-01' AND interaction_time < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, engagement_level FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE engagement_level > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' AND engagement_level = 3;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING interaction_count > 1 ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY customer_id, interaction_type ORDER BY customer_id, total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, engagement_level FROM Customers WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM EmailInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM Customers JOIN EmailInteractions ON Customers.customer_id = EmailInteractions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM EmailInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Newsletter' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, email_address, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM Customers LEFT JOIN EmailInteractions ON Customers.customer_id = EmailInteractions.customer_id WHERE engagement_level > 2 AND interaction_type = 'Feedback';

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, customer_name FROM EmailInteractions INNER JOIN Customers ON EmailInteractions.customer_id = Customers.customer_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_name HAVING total_interactions > 3 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;

SELECT customer_name, email_address, MAX(interaction_date) AS last_interaction_date FROM Customers LEFT JOIN EmailInteractions ON Customers.customer_id = EmailInteractions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING last_interaction_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, campaign_name, interaction_type FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT MAX(engagement_score) AS max_score FROM customers;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_time FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_level FROM engagement_levels WHERE engagement_level >= 3 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, engagement_level FROM customers JOIN engagement_levels ON customers.customer_id = engagement_levels.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, customer_id, engagement_level FROM engagement_levels WHERE engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id='abc123';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, engagement_level, engagement_date FROM customers INNER JOIN engagement_levels ON customers.customer_id = engagement_levels.customer_id WHERE engagement_level > 5 ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
